programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Profesionálnu svokru Gizku Oňovu si zavolala na pomoc 29-ročná Viera, ktorá žije vo Veľkom Krtíši s 24-ročným manželom Lukášom a svojimi dvoma synmi, 8-ročným Jakubkom a 3-ročným Lukáškom. Viera si už tri roky nevie dať rady s problémami, ktoré sužujú jej rodinu. Jej manžel Lukáš si totiž nevie nájsť cestu k jej staršiemu synovi Jakubkovi, ktorý bol výsledkom mladíckej nerozvážnosti s exotickým partnerom zo zahraničia. Viere prekáža, ako sa k nemu Lukáš správa, stále na neho len kričí a na rozdiel od ich spoločného syna Lukáška sa mu takmer vôbec nevenuje. Následkom toho medzi nimi vznikajú vážne partnerské hádky a Viera je už z celej situácie zúfalá. Dúfa, že skúsená Gizka odhalí, čo robia zle, kde nastala chyba, a dokáže ich rodinu zachrániť...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Pytačky: Zuzana má problém - drobné poškodenie cudzieho auta na parkovisku pred domom. Aj Milka má problém: s Gergejom si rozdelili náklady, ale energie a voda čo mal na starosti ostali nezaplatené. Prosí Františka, aby sa porozprával s Lászlóom a vyriešili to. Zuzana sa však “naštartuje" a ide to riešiť ona. Aj Ildi má problém, na parkovisku jej niekto oškrel auto. László sa chystá, že odhalí páchateľa. Keď príde Zuzana s Milkinou sťažnosťou, Ildi preberá iniciatívu a ide vysvetliť Milke, že je to nedorozumenie. Radšej by sa ona mala o Gergeja viac starať a najlepšie by bolo, keby počali spoločné dieťa. Inak si bude Andrejka stále brúsiť zuby na svojho bývalého frajera. Andrejkin nový priateľ - doktor Vojtíšek, nie je žiadna záruka. Andrejka však potrebuje poradiť. Spozorovala náznaky, že Bobík, ju chce požiadať o ruku. Všetci sú opatrní a radia jej vyčkať. Len Ildikó ju chce okamžite presvedčiť, aby povedala áno! Lászlóa a Františka na lesnej správe prekvapí aj doktor, ktorý hľadá radu v rovnakej veci. Bude László proti vlastnému presvedčeniu tlačiť Andrejku a Bobíka do zásnub? Dozvie sa Ildikó, kto jej oškrel auto? Ako to dopadne, ak požiada Bobík Andrejku naozaj o ruku? A prečo sa u Františka koná ďalšie stretnutie o 3 dni neskôr?

programme.title: Kuchyňa II
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Šéf má v nemocnici diétu, utečie odtiaľ len tak v župane, aby si kúpil hot-dog, no prichytia ho policajti, ktorí ho považujú za bezdomovca. Šéfa nakoniec zachráni Veronika, ktorá mu prinesie poriadne mäsové jedlo. Ešte viac sa zbližujú. Čekyho sleduje bulvárny novinár, Čeky preto naznačí Bohušovi a Dalinovi, aby sa novinára zbavili. Vysvitne, že je to súkromný detektív, ktorého si najala Nikola, lebo sa bála, že ju Čeky podvádza. V Kolibe sa objaví vegetarián, Bohuš a Dalino mu do pirohov tajne pridajú slaninu a jedlo vegetariánovi veľmi chutí. Anička sa snaží zachrániť vegetariána, ale tomu už zachutilo mäso.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Chorá láska: Mladí manželia Linda a Viktor sa z Bratislavy presťahovali do menšieho mesta. Dúfajú, že tu prežijú pokojnejší život, navyše Linda čaká ich prvé dieťa. Všetko sa zdá byť v poriadku až na jedného suseda, ktorý začne Lindu obťažovať...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Biba nedokáže Paule odpustiť, že jej tajila Borisov pomer s Erikou a skončí nielen s ňou ale aj s celým butikom. Vinco bude Cilku darmo hľadať, odišla za Lacim do Nemecka. Boris prezradí Nore, že ju Zorba odpočúva.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Braček: Anna a Ján sú manželmi vyše dvadsať rokov, spoločne vychovávajú sedemnásťročného syna Jána. Rodičovskú lásku rozdávajú aj iným deťom, ktoré nemajú to šťastie vyrastať v úplnej rodine. Všetko sa zmení, keď do rodiny vezmú Štefana...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Radosť života: Božka a Milka sa stali kamarátkami až v domove dôchodcov. Spoločne trávia každú voľnú chvíľu, rozumejú si a vedia o sebe takmer všetko. Ich neochvejné priateľstvo naštrbí príchod nového šarmantného pána...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Adopcia: Zuzana a Vlado svojho druhorodeného syna Lea vychovávajú veľmi prísne. Najmä Vlado má pocit, že starostlivosť o pubertiaka mu prerastá cez hlavu – o to viac nástojí na disciplíne. Leo má podozrenie, že Vlado nie je jeho otec...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Deti zverejnia na internete video opitého riaditeľa. Biba zmizla a Paula, v strachu o ňu urobí všetko, čo je v jej silách, aby ju našla. Nore sa podarí Zorbu zdiskreditovať, je podozrivý zo znásilnenia.

programme.title: Šaty snov
programme.sub-title: Šaty robia človeka. Nová reality šou
programme.desc: Pri výbere svadobných šiat často rozhoduje aj farba. Zhodne sa na nej motorkárka Timea s vlastnou mamou? Náročná Karin na svoju luxusnú svadbu pozvala 160 ľudí a má jasnú požiadavku – šaty musia ladiť aj s prostredím vinice, v ktorej sa bude svadba odohrávať. A čo sa stane, keď sa ráznej a rozhodnej Nikolete jasná vízia šiat hneď na začiatku zrúti ako domček z karát? Hovorí sa, že šaty robia človeka. Šaty určujú naše miesto v spoločnosti, ale taktiež hovoria o tom, ako sa v danom momente cítime. V novej reality šou TV Markíza Šaty snov uvidíme ľudí, ktorí si vyberajú svoje ideálne šaty pre najdôležitejšie momenty ich života – čím nemusí byť vždy len svadba. A aj keď sa to často nezaobíde bez prekvapení a nečakaných zvratov, majitelia módnych salónov robia všetko pre to, aby hľadanie skončilo happy endom.

programme.title: 2 na 1
programme.desc: V dnešnej časti si Adela s Danom vezmú „na paškál“ obľúbeného slovenského herca a zabávača Juraja Kemku. Zábavná relácia, v ktorej si dvaja moderátori - Adela Vinczeová a Dano Dangl - „podajú“ vždy jedného zaujímavého hosťa. Ten bude musieť absolvovať sériu rôznych úloh, skúšok alebo výziev, ktoré ho dostanú do neštandardných a nie celkom komfortných situácií. Diváci sa môžu tešiť na vtipné momenty a reakcie, ktoré vzniknú pod vplyvom nečakaných udalostí.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Profesionálnu svokru Gizku Oňovu si zavolala na pomoc 29-ročná Viera, ktorá žije vo Veľkom Krtíši s 24-ročným manželom Lukášom a svojimi dvoma synmi, 8-ročným Jakubkom a 3-ročným Lukáškom. Viera si už tri roky nevie dať rady s problémami, ktoré sužujú jej rodinu. Jej manžel Lukáš si totiž nevie nájsť cestu k jej staršiemu synovi Jakubkovi, ktorý bol výsledkom mladíckej nerozvážnosti s exotickým partnerom zo zahraničia. Viere prekáža, ako sa k nemu Lukáš správa, stále na neho len kričí a na rozdiel od ich spoločného syna Lukáška sa mu takmer vôbec nevenuje. Následkom toho medzi nimi vznikajú vážne partnerské hádky a Viera je už z celej situácie zúfalá. Dúfa, že skúsená Gizka odhalí, čo robia zle, kde nastala chyba, a dokáže ich rodinu zachrániť...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Chorá láska: Mladí manželia Linda a Viktor sa z Bratislavy presťahovali do menšieho mesta. Dúfajú, že tu prežijú pokojnejší život, navyše Linda čaká ich prvé dieťa. Všetko sa zdá byť v poriadku až na jedného suseda, ktorý začne Lindu obťažovať...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Sestry: Sestry Tereza a Kristína navštevujú gymnázium, mladšia Tereza si však nerozumie s učiteľkou angličtiny a má pocit, že si na ňu zasadla. Keď náhodou odhalí tajomstvo svojej sestry Kristíny, napadne jej, ako vyriešiť svoje problémy s angličtinou.

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Televízna svokra Gizka Oňová prichádza na pomoc do Veľkého Krtíša, oslovil ju list od Ľubice, tá sa už nedokáže prizerať krutému osudu detí jej kamarátky Vierky, ktorá pred štyrmi mesiacmi zomrela na rakovinu. Viera po sebe zanechala 21-ročnú Martinu a 15-ročného Lukáša, pričom Martina má už aj svoju vlastnú 3-ročnú dcérku Natálku s priateľom, ktorý ju následne nechal. Ich otec Vojtech pracuje v Česku a vôbec sa o nich nestará, aj vplyvom alkoholu mali s Vierou časté fyzické konflikty, ktoré vyústili do rozvodu. Martina si po Vierinej smrti vzala Lukáša do opatery, je však nezamestnaná a nedostáva takmer žiadnu finančnú podporu, následkom čoho prišli o bývanie a skončili v podnájme, ktorý však tiež finančne neutiahnu. Ocitli sa doslova v beznádejnej situácii, jednou nohou na ulici a bez reálnej šance si niečo vybaviť, Gizkina pomoc je preto bytostne dôležitá...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Babský večer: Marta je frustrovaná, musí variť, aby si udržala chlapa. Zuzana má tiež všetkého po krk. Rozhodnú sa, že jeden deň v mesiaci bude "babský večer". Šampanské, vodná fajka a striptér! A najlepšie, ak sa to uskutoční ešte dnes. Andrejka musí zrušiť romantickú večeru s frajerom, a Ildikó, musí zorganizovať stráženie Ágoštona Lászlóom a Františkom u Milky, ktorá na nich dohliadne. Zuzana Milku na akciu nechce pozývať, lebo pred dcérou, by sa nedokázala uvoľniť. František s Lászlóom pre Ágoštona a Evana vymyslia program na Lesnej správe. László si pre istotu dá dvojnásobnú dávku nových piluliek na upokojenie. Ako dopadne detský deň na Lesnej správe? Podarí sa Marte zohnať náhradu za striptéra, ktorý ochorel? Aké vedľajšie účinky má predávkovanie sa Lászlóovými tabletkami? Čo na babskej žúrke bez manželov a partnerov robí Martin frajer?! A kto nepozvaný sa tam ešte objaví?

programme.title: Kuchyňa II
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Saška s Aničkou sa neustále len hádajú a Michalovi s Jankom sa nijako nedarí presvedčiť ich, aby sa pomerili. Aj Dalino s Bohušom sa hádajú – ale títo dvaja sa hádajú o to, kto je väčšia hviezda slovenského šoubiznisu. Šéf sa pred Veronikou v nemocnici tvári, že je v bezvedomí.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Kto z koho: Kysučan Karol sa po dlhých rokoch rozhodol navštíviť kamaráta Vlada žijúceho na Záhorí. Dúfal, že si obaja urobia pánsku jazdu plnú veselých spomienok na staré časy. Všetko sa však zomlelo inak, Karol nemohol tušiť, kto v susedstve Vlada býva...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Paľko s Milankom sa vyberú tajne stopom do Prahy. Boris sa prizná Bibe, že na začiatku ich vzťahu mal skutočne pomer aj s Erikou. Vinco urobí všetko preto, aby si udobril Cilku, podarí sa mu to?

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Ten druhý: Tomáš strávil niekoľko rokov v zahraničí. Krátko po návrate domov spoznal Inu a hneď sa do seba zamilovali. Po niekoľkých mesiacoch chodenia je ich vzťah vystavený prvej veľkej skúške...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Matilda: Dôchodkyňa Matilda je vdovou. Žije sama v nenápadnej bytovke, do ktorej ju občas chodí navštíviť jediný syn Filip. Ten má zlé obdobie, rozvádza sa a takmer nič mu nevychádza. Jedného dňa spoznáva na schodoch susedu Tinu, ktorá sa háda na chodbe s partnerom...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Internet: Ingrid a Tomáš sú manželia dlhé roky, postupom času sa však začali vzájomne odcudzovať. Tomáš si svoju frustráciu z rodinného života ventiluje na sociálnych sieťach s inými ženami. Ingrid je presvedčená, že Tomáš je jej neverný...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Študentka: Jana s Michalom sú manželia už dvadsať rokov. Vlani prekonali manželskú krízu, ale manželstvo sa im podarilo zachrániť. Odvtedy však panuje medzi nimi istý druh nedôvery. Tá u Jany vzrástla po tom, čo poštou prišiel balíček s erotickým obsahom.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Sestry: Sestry Tereza a Kristína navštevujú gymnázium, mladšia Tereza si však nerozumie s učiteľkou angličtiny a má pocit, že si na ňu zasadla. Keď náhodou odhalí tajomstvo svojej sestry Kristíny, napadne jej, ako vyriešiť svoje problémy s angličtinou.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Medové týždne: Jana s Pavlom sa zobrali len pred niekoľkými dňami. Jana si práve presťahovala posledné veci do Pavlovho domu a tešila sa, že spolu mohli plánovať svadobnú cestu. Pavol však novomanželku prekvapil správou, že dostal zaujímavú pracovnú ponuku do Kanady. A chce, aby s nimi cestovala aj atraktívna slobodná mamička, ktorá sa stará o jeho dom.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Dagmar žije v Šali spolu so svojou 16-ročnou dcérou Karolínou. Veľmi ju trápi, že už neuveriteľných 17 rokov nenavštívila svojich rodičov. Tvrdí, že otec ju nechcel pustiť ani len do brány rodinného domu a rodina sa od nej nepochopiteľne odtiahla. Dagmar si preto zavolala profesionálnu svokru Gizku Oňovú, aby jej pomohla udobriť sa s rodičmi a po dlhých rokoch napraviť vážne narušené medziľudské vzťahy. Gizka však zistí, že najmä Dagmar má maslo na hlave a závažných problémov v jej živote je ešte omnoho viac...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Výročník: Minulý týždeň dal László Františkovi darček. Podpivník z podniku kde sa pred 30-timi rokmi začalo ich priateľstvo. František mu na oplátku daroval pohár z piva, ktoré tam píjavali. Lenže na fotografii s čašníčkou Lucianou s bujným poprsím, z ktorej každý opatruje jednu polovicu, vidno že v krčme sa čapovala úplne iná značka! Pre Lászlóa je to koniec ich priateľstva. Ildikó aj Zuzane vadí, že Andrejkin nový frajer, doktor Vojtíšek, v snahe zapadnúť, je veľmi "vlezlý". Je ale veľmi slušný a takého človeka je ťažko vyhodiť. Zuzana chce z ich štvorice doplnenej o Martu vytvoriť silnú komunitu, aby pochopil, že tam nepatrí a dal pokoj. Lenže najprv musia udobriť Lászlóa s Františkom. Uskutočnia happening, kde zrekonštruujú ich prvé stretnutie. Čo odhalia pri hľadaní dobových rekvizít vo Františkovej "škatuli na spomienky"? Čo spája Lászlóa a Františka s atraktívnou čašníčkou okrem spomienok? Podarí sa im ju po toľkých rokoch nájsť? Ako dopadne celé udobrovanie?

programme.title: Kuchyňa II
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Michal si k sebe nasťahuje Sašku. Bohuš zastupuje Šéfa a nechtiac sa zamotá do problémov s úžerníkmi. Anička zachraňuje korytnačku, ktorú chce Nikola uvariť bohatému hosťovi.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Hanbliví: Anita bude mať tridsať. Je to krehká bytosť, ktorá si žije vo svojom svete. Celý život prežila v bytovke v susedstve rovnako starého Leonarda. Ten má tiež svoj svet, takže by sa zdalo, že obaja sa k sebe hodia. Do bytovky sa však prisťahuje Samuel, ktorý by mohol byť snom každej ženy...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Klára škodoradostne Nore oznámi, že sa s Michalom pobozkali. Boris sa rozhodne spolupracovať so Zorbom a potopiť tým Noru. Paľkovi príde zle z kakaa, ktorým ho Viktor priotrávil, a tak Viktorovi už nič nebráni splniť úlohu od Jevgeniho.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Učiteľka: Oto pred pár rokmi prišiel o manželku, odvtedy sa sám stará o dospievajúceho syna Filipa. Napriek tomu, že majú kamarátsky vzťah, nechce ani jeden tomu druhému povedať o svojom ľúbostnom vzťahu. O to väčšie prekvapenie čaká na oboch...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Ex: Juraj odišiel od rodiny a oženil s Majou. Bývalá manželka Alica sa s tým stále nevie zmieriť, chcela by Juraja späť. O desať rokov mladšia Maja si zasa ťažko zvyká na Jurajove deti. Situácia sa skomplikuje, keď sa obe ženy stanú susedkami...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zať: Karol je úspešný právnik, na právnickej praxi dokázal za krátky čas veľmi zbohatnúť. Manželku Mirku i dcéru miluje, rád ich rozmaznáva luxusnými darčekmi. Má veľmi dobrý vzťah so svokrou. Až do momentu, kedy sa jeho správanie bez vysvetlenia zásadne zmení...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Paľko s Milankom sa vyberú tajne stopom do Prahy. Boris sa prizná Bibe, že na začiatku ich vzťahu mal skutočne pomer aj s Erikou. Vinco urobí všetko preto, aby si udobril Cilku, podarí sa mu to?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Pašeráci. Komediálny seriál SR (2016).
programme.desc: Tereza má hlavu v smútku, v Hornej Dolnej jej vyrástla konkurencia! No do Hornej Dolnej treba dobrú pálenku prepašovať!

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Domobrana. Komediálny seriál SR (2016).
programme.desc: Blaškovú v noci prepadli! A zločinec sa stále potuluje po dedine…

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Vypočujte si hlásenie. Komediálny seriál SR (2016).
programme.desc: Ďuro má vážny problém. Erika ruší zásnuby a hľadá si nového nápadníka!

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Dagmar žije v Šali spolu so svojou 16-ročnou dcérou Karolínou. Veľmi ju trápi, že už neuveriteľných 17 rokov nenavštívila svojich rodičov. Tvrdí, že otec ju nechcel pustiť ani len do brány rodinného domu a rodina sa od nej nepochopiteľne odtiahla. Dagmar si preto zavolala profesionálnu svokru Gizku Oňovú, aby jej pomohla udobriť sa s rodičmi a po dlhých rokoch napraviť vážne narušené medziľudské vzťahy. Gizka však zistí, že najmä Dagmar má maslo na hlave a závažných problémov v jej živote je ešte omnoho viac...

programme.desc: First Steps. From Africa to Sri Lanka to Iceland, animal babies learn the most basic tools for survival during the first three months of life.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild II (5)
programme.desc: Visiting the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazil's beautiful Pantanal wetland and track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (7)
programme.desc: Colors & Patterns. The blonde manes of golden snub-nose monkeys; pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet; the markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (8)
programme.desc: The Big Ones. A gorilla wrestling match, pushy moose antlers, long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and a megashark's stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (2)
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula; Muaupo. Setting sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals; watching as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Multitudes: the Power of Numbers
programme.desc: Learn how life multiplies and comes together to create some of the most beautiful and overwhelming natural spectacles on Earth. Look inside puddles, oceans, wetlands, and other ecosystems to understand why wild creatures congregate in crowds.

programme.title: Multitudes: the Power of Numbers
programme.desc: Learn how life multiplies and comes together to create some of the most beautiful and overwhelming natural spectacles on Earth. Look inside puddles, oceans, wetlands, and other ecosystems to understand why wild creatures congregate in crowds.

programme.title: Shadowlands (2)
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water. New Zealand's dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep; as winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands (3)
programme.desc: Age of Independence. The south-eastern coast of New Zealand is the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults; young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island (5)
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty. In the Berenty Reserve, the troops rushed to make use of the short food bounty that followed early rains but then the dry heat returned; with their pups getting larger there's more pressure to find food.

programme.title: Gorillas of Gabon
programme.desc: Trackers search for Mussiru, a 400-pound silverback gorilla, in Gabon; their mission is to habituate him to humans because the future of his bloodline and the rainforest he inhabits depend on it.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VII (9)
programme.desc: Axis Mundi. A group of weasels is ready to be released; a volunteer attempts to rescue an eagle; a gull flies free.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets (5)
programme.desc: Devon Island: Land of Ice. Devon Island in Nunavut is the largest uninhabited island in the world; the icy landscape is so barren that NASA uses it to simulate conditions on Mars.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VII (13)
programme.sub-title: Aguas de Marco. Valentines day at the rehab.
programme.desc: Aguas de Marco. Valentines day at the rehab.

programme.title: World's Most Scenic River Journeys (3)
programme.desc: The River Po, Italy. Bill Nighy narrates a trip along the River Po, traveling across northern Italy from the snow-capped Alps to the delta where it meets the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Hubble's Canvas
programme.sub-title: Eye of the Beholder. Revealing the masterpieces that about in the universe.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (6)
programme.desc: Bad Reputations. Some people are fighting to save the endangered massasauga rattlesnake, which was vilified for years.

programme.title: Wild Fighters (3)
programme.desc: The Fight for Food. The most elemental and pure survival is based on eating; if an animal is not healthy, strong, and agile, they cannot compete to mate, defend their family from any threat, nor will they be able to achieve good status in their clan.

programme.title: Wild Latam
programme.desc: Wild Latam. A recompilation of the best moments of Wild Latam, including capuchin monkeys breaking nuts in Brazil, pink dolphins swimming in the Amazon, the munguba tree, elephant seals, and more.

programme.title: Wild Latam (1)
programme.desc: Patagonia: Argentina. On Argentina's coasts, hundreds of thousands of penguins gather; elephant seals fight over their harems, and sea lions face ambush; further inland, indigenous armadillos inhabited vast plains.

programme.title: Podvodníci IV (11)

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Bear Under Lock And Key. Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: An Imaginary Injury. While Lewis prepares for the arrival of the Carrot-Grow Cloud (which will triple his carrot harvest), the King almost runs into him with his chariot! Luckily, the rabbit suffered more fear than pain, but the monarch is convinced he was badly affected by this accident! Wanting to do the right thing, he forces Lewis to rest and goes about pampering him. Our rabbit friend doesn’t dare contradict him. But the Carrot-Grow-Cloud is approaching, and, at this rate, the King is going to spoil everything! Alice decides to help her friend accomplish his harvesting mission and say ‘No’ to the King, without offending him…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The King's Birthday. After discovering that the King has never celebrated his birthday, Alice and Lewis set about finding out what would make him happy. But he’s so obsessed with being a good sovereign that their job proves more difficult than expected. The problem is: his majesty is so used to helping other people at the drop of a hat and bending over backwards for them that he’s unable to do anything for himself! So our two heroes pull out all the stops to make sure the King ignores his “rescue missions” for a while so he can concentrate on finding a hobby of his own.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: For the Win. Ella’s mom is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Highs and Lows. Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturn’s moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Big Little Problems. How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - that’s how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Big Break. After hurting her leg, Ella has to take it easy for an entire day. Does she have the patience to sit and rest for that long? When she runs out of activities at home, Ella’s dad offers to take her along on one of his towing operations

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cheesy Ball Run. Tom, Jerry and Butch watch a Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs commercial and when they hear the words "Supplies are running out," the trio's rivalry reaches new heights as they compete to get what they imagine to be the very last bag of the snack food.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Say Uncle. Jerry's Uncle Harry is coming for a visit. Tuffy's excited to meet the Great Uncle he has heard so much about. Harry craves a respite from his life as a nomad on the party cruise ship circuit, but it doesn't take him long to realize that life on the high seas has its advantages -- specifically, not being holed up with Tom!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Here Comes the Bribe. Toodles' folks are coming for a visit. The problem is, they think she's married with kittens. Tom happily plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their adorable kittens. Complications ensue when Toodles' dad doesn't take to Tom; her mom coddles Jerry and Tuffy a little too much; and Toodles' ex-boyfriend, Butch, learns that his girl "got hitched."

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Slaphappy Birthday. It's Spike's birthday and he has been counting the days down. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special, but not this one. He has forgotten! Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires -- but don't worry, it ends happily.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Reward If Lost. After Jerry mocks up a "Reward If Found" poster for Tom with the address of a neighbor with a ferocious dog, some good Samaritans bring Tom "home." Now, Tom has to escape from the house with his nine lives intact before he's brought back again and again.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Big Top Tom. After believing that Jerry has been eaten by a hungry bear cub, Tom must avoid the mama bear's wrath as he tries to retrieve his pal. Meanwhile, oblivious to Tom's plight, Jerry's enjoying the perks of circus life.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Percy and the Skunks
programme.desc: Percy and the Skunks

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...

All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Losing Game! The Queen and King appoint Alice and Lewis to play Kroki-kroka (a kind of mini-golf) on their behalf. But when the King is unfortunate enough to compliment the Queen on her “inability to lose,” she takes umbrage and decides to become the biggest loser of all time!! Even if it means sabotaging the match!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Abracada-Present. In order to get her confiscated skateboard back from the Queen (her aunt), Dinah must give her the “perfect gift.” Easy peasy: it just so happens that Lewis has a gift-making machine! Having said that, in order to manufacture the gift, the girl must use objects that match the Queen’s tastes. And since Dinah is in such a hurry to get her skateboard back, she neglects this fact, making the situation even worse. So much so that the Queen says she’ll keep the skateboard forever! But with Alice and Lewis’ help, Dinah learns more about her aunt, enabling her to come up with a gift the monarch really likes, and retrieve her precious skateboard as a result.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Glitch's Big Day. When Glitch’s arm shorts out, Ella’s dad has the right tools to fix him. While he’s at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Pet Sitter. Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friend’s dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. She decides to take on both responsibilities at once by taking Buttons with her to the planet to capture the final piece of video footage she needs. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. It’s Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldn’t have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Frenemies. When Rick and Ginger argue on their anniversary, Cupid decides to get involved. However, he gets a head injury in a chase between Tom and Jerry and forgets who he is. Now it's on Tom and Jerry to remind Cupid of his identity and help Ginger and Rick stop fighting.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: You Are What You Eat. Rick and Ginger wake up late and, in their hurry, they accidentally put dog food in Tom's bowl and cat food in Spike's. This causes Spike to behave like a cat and Tom to act like a dog. Although they're confused at first, they soon eat other types of food and discover how it makes them act.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Not My Tyke. Spike orders Tom and Jerry to watch Tyke while he's away, but instead Tom takes the opportunity to chase Jerry in the backyard. Suddenly, Tyke is nowhere to be seen and the front gate is wide open! Tom and Jerry must find the pup in time or face Spike's beating.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Everyone Into the Pool. When Tom and Jerry go to a pool party at Toodles's place, Tom shows off in the pool with ridiculous stunts. Butch and Meathead arrive, adding more rivalry to the party. Soon, Toodles suggests they play a game of water polo, which reaches a fever pitch before long.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: A Head For Science. On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, Tom is carried off to Dr. Frankenstein's castle lab. Several lightning bolts later, a monster comes to life: a nine-foot-tall hulk with Tom's relatively tiny head sewn on. Frankenstein orders the monster to go terrorize the village, but it has problems focusing after Tom's head sees Jerry in the lab.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Constellation Prize. Slippy’s attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. It’s up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Junk. When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippy’s determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.desc: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mirror Madness. Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's Magic Mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection that she gives up on all her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows. When Dorothy tries to recover the mirror, the mirror breaks and the "Reflection Beast" is released! To stop her reflection, Wilhelmina must do something "good" and looks to Dorothy to train her in the ways of goodness.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Everything's Coming Up Poppies. It's the Poppin' Poppies Parade and while making a float for Queen Ozma, Dorothy and her friends run out of poppies. When Wilhelmina gives them some of hers, it turns out they're the Wicked Witch's enchanted sleeping poppies, and Wilhelmina is planning to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers when she falls asleep. Now, it's up to Tin Man and Scarecrow to get help from the Good Witch Glinda before Wilhelmina steals Dorothy's slippers and all of Oz is put to sleep forever.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: A Cut Above the Rest. Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the big Oz Royal Ball, where all the Royals of Oz will meet. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the proper protocol, but luckily Patchwork Girl makes a magic dress that will help her! But when Wilhelmina's monkey minions, Frank and Lyman, sabotage the dress, the animated gown wreaks havoc, starting skirmishes between the royals. How will Dorothy manage to fix the Ball and show she was born to be a princess?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wheelers of Fortune. Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find that Rustle, the biggest and baddest Wheeler, has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact that his back wheel is broken. Dorothy brings Rustle to Smith & Tinker to fix his wheel. Overwhelmed with gratitude, Rustle helps them speedily repair the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Sister Sister. Glinda the Good's twin sister, Melinda the Mean, plans to displace Glinda as the most loved witch in Oz. Melinda thinks that being good can't be hard. But when each of Melinda's "good" deeds shows her true colors, Dorothy and the gang figure out there is an imposter! Now, they not only have to find Glinda, but also prove to the Munchkins that she is the true Good Witch.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The "Werewolf Cactus". Lewis gets a shock when he wakes up one morning and sees all his carrots have been gobbled up overnight! To get to the bottom of it, Alice and Lewis call on the Police Card. Our two heroes accuse Dodson right off the bat: he seems to be the perfect suspect! But then discover the true culprit: a cactus that transforms into a “werewolf cactus” when night falls! And Alice and Lewis are in for a big surprise when they find out who is behind this famished creature!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Spirit of Adventure. Lewis is at the end of his rope: the Twins have set up home in his yard and have left the Cutie-Twees to their own devices, letting them wreak havoc in the poor rabbit’s house! Alice devises a stratagem to restore Twee Di and Twee Dum’s taste for adventure and travel. But little does she know they’re still recovering from their last expedition, which went seriously south!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dancing Bean. Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Momella Day. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. And this Momella day promises to be the most interstellar yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Martian Chronicles. Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: That's so Madhu. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they can’t hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ghost Story. Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Slinging in the Rain. The storm of the century is brewing -- according to Tuffy and Jerry, that is, who are giving Tom a little payback for tormenting them earlier. Spike also gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Squeaky Clean. Fed up with Tom's cat hair, Rick buys the "Suck-Up," a next level Roomba-like cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans nonstop. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming machine turns on them both and takes over the house -- Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tough Luck Duck. Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he inadvertently walks under a ladder. When a series of unfortunate and painful incidents happen to Tom, Jerry and Spike, but not Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Paper Airplane Chase. Tom is determined to hijack the fun Jerry and Tuffy are having making paper airplanes, but the hijinks take a turn for the worse when Tom realizes he's made a paper airplane out of Ginger's great-great-grandmother's treasured fruitcake recipe.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Round Tripped. If an injured Tom hasn't gotten better before Rick and Ginger leave for their weekend getaway, Tom will be forced to stay at the Jolly Friends Pet Oasis -- which is anything but jolly for Tom. Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom into doing anything but rest; after all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Smitten with the Kitten. Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues. The only thing that ends it is the news that the kitten has a new home.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Kana and the Butterflies
programme.desc: Kana and the Butterflies

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: An Imaginary Injury. While Lewis prepares for the arrival of the Carrot-Grow Cloud (which will triple his carrot harvest), the King almost runs into him with his chariot! Luckily, the rabbit suffered more fear than pain, but the monarch is convinced he was badly affected by this accident! Wanting to do the right thing, he forces Lewis to rest and goes about pampering him. Our rabbit friend doesn’t dare contradict him. But the Carrot-Grow-Cloud is approaching, and, at this rate, the King is going to spoil everything! Alice decides to help her friend accomplish his harvesting mission and say ‘No’ to the King, without offending him…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The King's Birthday. After discovering that the King has never celebrated his birthday, Alice and Lewis set about finding out what would make him happy. But he’s so obsessed with being a good sovereign that their job proves more difficult than expected. The problem is: his majesty is so used to helping other people at the drop of a hat and bending over backwards for them that he’s unable to do anything for himself! So our two heroes pull out all the stops to make sure the King ignores his “rescue missions” for a while so he can concentrate on finding a hobby of his own.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Big Little Problems. How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - that’s how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Big Break. After hurting her leg, Ella has to take it easy for an entire day. Does she have the patience to sit and rest for that long? When she runs out of activities at home, Ella’s dad offers to take her along on one of his towing operations

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Costume Party... As Rick and Ginger prepare for a costume party, Tom tries to score some snacks. Jerry and Tuffy are out to do the same. Spike and Tom are initially confused by the guests' costumes. Determined to get their paws on as much party food as they can, however, they contrive their own costumes to crash the party. Will they get away with it?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Battle of the... Old Snelgrove, the senior butler, is retiring. There is an open backyard Olympics on the estate to see who will replace him. When the contestants in the field are narrowed down to Butch and Tom, what will the final outcome be?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Kid Stuff. A little baby goat butts his head through a distant wall of the estate and starts nibbling the grass. At first, he helps Tom with the yardwork but then causes chaos throughout the manor. Tom and Jerry are left to deal with the kid.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Stolen Heart. When a gorgeous feline walks into the Cat and Mouse Detective Agency, Tom is immediately smitten. But someone has already stolen her heart—a heart-shaped cake made for a gangster and his fiancée on their upcoming engagement. He asked for the expensive engagement ring to be baked into the batter as a Valentine's Day surprise, but the cake and the jewelry were stolen from the bakery window.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Last Laugh. Red Herring complains to Tom and Jerry that he keeps hearing laughter everywhere he goes. Tom and Jerry bodyguard Red to prevent him from doing anything that might provoke laughter, but Red's goof-ups and fails soon have even them convulsed. Gradually, it gets loud enough that Tom and Jerry can hear it too. Will they find the true source of the laughter?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Invisible Cat. On another scary night in the castle, The Invisible Cat wants nothing more than to catch mice. After it picks up and carries Jerry and Tuffy, Tom is really confused (and spooked) to see the two mice "magically" float through the air! When Tom accidentally smacks The Invisible Cat in the face and knocks Jerry and Tuffy free of his hold, it sparks a slapstick fight between the two cats.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Maggie 2.0. When a botched update causes Maggie to reboot as “Magz”, a super fun party animal, Ella, Slippy and Madhu are excited! At least until “Magz” excessive ways put them all in danger! Now, our gang have to figure out how to get Maggie 1.0 back, pronto!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Message. When a probe arrives from Madhu’s sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special “thing” they have isn’t a thing at all...

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Sandy Tidies Up
programme.desc: Sandy Tidies Up

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: A Cut Above the Rest. Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the big Oz Royal Ball, where all the Royals of Oz will meet. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the proper protocol, but luckily Patchwork Girl makes a magic dress that will help her! But when Wilhelmina's monkey minions, Frank and Lyman, sabotage the dress, the animated gown wreaks havoc, starting skirmishes between the royals. How will Dorothy manage to fix the Ball and show she was born to be a princess?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Double Teatime in Wonderland. Jealous of the King of Frostaland, who is celebrating Alice’s “non-birthday,” the Queen organizes a double-teatime at the castle and forces all her subjects to attend. Alice and Lewis try to enjoy both celebrations. But there’s no denying it: it’s way more chill at the King’s party than the Queen’s, where the poor guests are subjected to fear and intimidation! In fact, it’s so bad that before long, the Queen’s guests start defecting, migrating to the more fun venue in Frostaland. Alice and Lewis try to avoid a crisis by making sure the Queen doesn’t find out they’re having fun behind her back…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Dodson's Predictions. In order to escape punishment, Dodson kids the Queen into believing he is able to read the future. Falling for his story, Queen names him “Great Fortune-Telling Dodo” and invites him to live in the castle. Dodson milks it, using his influence over the monarch to fulfill all his desires, even if it means relieving poor Lewis of his clockmaster duties! Luckily, Alice runs to her rabbit friend’s rescue. But how are they going to prove to the Queen that Dodson doesn’t actually have a single power and that he’s merely using her for his own benefit?!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Magic Day Out. Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ball Pool. Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Pizza Bean. Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Photograph. Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: 12345 Once I Caught A Fish Alive! V1
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Commander Slippy. The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippy's instruction. He soon realises it's because Glitch saw the comet he's been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Earthbound Priya. Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t nail it

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Palladium Quest. When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But it’s a metal so rare it’s only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Friendship Supernova. Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.
